name: Fiat Lux
description:
Week 1 Project.

Verdict: Barely Playable

A game in which you must pick up a light and carry it to a goal. A secondary mechanic was to light torches that your light fell upon and use that to open up the goal, but I didn't finish that part. There are a lot of movement bugs and the polish is pretty abysmall.

All in all, a good first week with lots of learnings. :D

- I need to look into performance issues when exporting itch.io

- I need an Exit button and a Music/Sound Options menu in my next game
